content.question: The phrase "they'd stand flat-footed" (paragraph 5, sentence 6) suggests that the

choices.label: townspeople would not be impressed by her fashionable ways
townspeople would not be ready for what she has to say
townspeople would not be able to understand why she wanted to leave
speaker and her former neighbors are not on friendly terms

content.answer: townspeople would not be impressed by her fashionable ways

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
